testcase.name: Home Page Top Panel Section
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Amazon home page...........................................passed Then user gets a Amazon search field........................................passed And username is also displayed next to search field.........................passed And Amazon logo is also displayed...........................................passed And Cart link is also displayed.............................................passed

testcase.name: Amazon Todays Deals section
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Amazon home page...........................................passed When user scrolls down to Todays Deals section..............................passed Then user gets the list of multiple products................................passed And user gets product image and price details...............................passed And user can see more products by clicking on carousel......................passed

testcase.name: Amazon Footer Links section
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Amazon home page...........................................passed When user scrolls down to footer of the page................................passed Then user gets all Country links............................................passed And user gets all amazon services links.....................................passed And User gets all privacy policy links......................................passed
